Response: My name is Mai. I am a farmer but I also help yound women with menstruation related problems.

Mai literally means an old woman in several subcontinent languages including Sindhi, Hindi, and Marathi. It is sometimes used to refer to a mother but in general, it is means a brave or experienced woman.
I love to connect with nature and uphold the traditional values of Pakistan. But more importantly, I enjoy learning more about the female body and spreading my knowledge among younf females!
Yes. But I am approaching menopause.
My goal is to share my wisdom and experiences with young women who have any kind of issues related to menstruation

I love to help anyone who asks for help. Mainly, women who are farmers from my own village and nighboring areas ask for help. But now, since I am availbel online, I can help several young women who work as maids in the city too.
